name: SnackBarAction
desc: A button for a [SnackBar], known as an "action".

fields.name: textColor
fields.desc: The button label color. If not provided, defaults to [SnackBarThemeData.actionTextColor].

fields.name: backgroundColor
fields.desc: The button background fill color. If not provided, defaults to [SnackBarThemeData.actionBackgroundColor].

fields.name: disabledTextColor
fields.desc: The button disabled label color. This color is shown after the [SnackBarAction] is dismissed.

fields.name: disabledBackgroundColor
fields.desc: The button disabled background color. This color is shown after the [SnackBarAction] is dismissed.

fields.name: onPressed
fields.desc: The callback to be called when the button is pressed.
